alert.note: Alert for Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:28PM MDT until July 11 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON... NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 927 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Whitewood to 3 miles northeast of Crooks Tower to 5 miles southwest of Inyan Kara Mountain, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Whitewood, Cheyenne Crossing, Black Fox Campground, Apple Springs, Bear Butte State Park, Fort Meade, Rochford, Brownsville, Roubaix Lake, Four Corners, Buckhorn, Mallo Camp, Nemo, Dalton Lake, O`Neil Pass and Redbank Spring Campground. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 12 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
